#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

DCP provide direct access to wck BUS to enable Servo to be controlled via serial port. In  order to access additional a capabilities a read servo position for servo ID 30 with the following data parameter will return a two byte data response, contain the information requested:


= Details =
Cmd:
||1||Get X & Z ||
||2||Get Y & Z ||
||3||PSD on ||
||4||PSD off ||
||5||Gat PSD ||
||6||Get Voltage ||
||7||Read IR ||
||8||sampling on ||
||9||sampling off ||
||10||Read sound ||
||11||Read timer ||
||12||Get MIC level ||
||65 - 90||Play Sound: ||
